title: LAST GAME #5 (1-2 ThrowBots) YET AGAIN ASTRONOMICAL ODDS!!! Perfect Example of Dysfunctional System.
body:
(Pointless to even post this nonsense anymore, out of last 11 games 9 have beeen BLATANT OVER THE TOP TROLLING CHEATING.)

The duo on my team asks to report the feeding trolling Nasus.

WHAT IN THE F FOR?! 

Do not report this 1 account,  unless you are also reporting the enemy team for running the bot, but of course, typical cognitive dissonance, it's just "another bad player" and bad luck. Which is the Riiot narrative. So,  instead of realizing they have been scammed, by botters/cheaters and indirectly by  Riot, they rage all game at Nasus. Because they think this is a real person.

Then they ask for report at end of the game. 

Now, who do you think  here will get punished? The cheating lying scum? Or the justified rager?

This is reality...

replies.body:
> Now, who do you think  here will get punished? The cheating lying scum? Or the justified rager?

There is no such thing as a justified rager, so both. Unless nobody reported the "cheating lying scum", in which case just the rager. Can't get caught if nobody reports you.

Also, I would suggest keeping information about who is reporting whom out of the entirety of the match, as it only takes one report to flag the game for review.
